name: Water Savior Money Saving Dual Flush Kit (Drought Special)
description:
Convert any standard toilet tank to money saving machine with the Water Savior Dual Flush kit. 

Includes all hardware: 
1 - Fill valve (replace or upgrade current fill valve)
1 - Adjustable dual flush regulator (replaces flapper)
1 - Modular two button dual action flush handle (replaces handle)

+ All the grommets, screws, nuts, and washers to ensure a leak proof toilet

+ Installation and Configuration Instructions

Installs in 20 minutes

(Installations currently available for Raleigh, Durham, Chapel Hill, Carrboro, Charlotte NC and Atlanta, GA areas)

name: Water Savior Dual Flush Kit Installation Serivce
description:
Have us come and install your Water Savior Kit and start saving money today!

(Installations currently available for Raleigh, Durham, Chapel Hill, Carrboro, Charlotte NC and Atlanta, GA areas)

name: Water Savior Dual Flush Value Bundle
description: Get the Water Savior Home Bundle and receive 4 Water Savior Kits... Enough materials for the master, the kids, and the guest restrooms! Total Savings = $32...
